DC CODE ยง 1-1162.08

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Two members of the Ethics Board shall constitute a quorum for the transaction of business.
The Ethics Board may delegate to an individual member or to the Director of Government Ethics its power to investigate or hold a hearing.

part.text: District of Columbia Board of Ethics and Government Accountability Establishment.
